Salinas.Rancho Sausal: Rancho Sausal was a 10,242-acre (41.45 km2) Mexican land grant in the Salinas Valley, in present day Monterey County, California given in 1834 by Governor José Figueroa to José Tibúrcio Castro. An additional grant was made by Governor Pío Pico in 1845. The name is Spanish for "willow grove".
